import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Toolbar from "../../../Toolbar/Toolbar"; import Sidedrawer from "../../../Sidedrawer/Sidedrawer"; import FooterMain from "../../../Footer/FooterMain/FooterMain"; import Aux from "../../../../Hoc/Aux/Aux"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faMapMarkerAlt, faEnvelopeOpenText } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import styles from './RepairQuote.module.css'; const RepairQuote = (props) => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []) return (

{props.brand} Repair Services

Complete LCD Replacement £30
Not Charging £40
Liquid Damage £50
Battery Replacement £60

How to Book for A Repair

Book for An Appoinment

Click the Button Above

Visit Us In Store

271 Old Kent Rd, London SE1 5LU

 ) } export default RepairQuote;
